summary: I was working on a high-workload system that delivers ads to players. It handles more than 600 mln requests daily and all of them are delivered super fast to a player. System is written mostly in Node.js. Unfortunatelly due to unexpected bad company's financial condition we decided to terminate our contract.

My main responsibility was to deliver software for internal bank's stakeholders. Due to company's strategy, one of main points of focus was to switch with software to cloud solutions. I supported company with that movement in projects I worked in and a couple of more that needed support. Responsibilities I took part in consisted of Python development with a frontend written in React and deploying it to Google Cloud Platform using Kubernetes. Second project was a data-heavy search engine to find best matching client based on as few parameters as possible, that were mistake tolerant and were deliver blazingly fast.

This company is an inside "software house", that creates MVP solutions based on businessmen ideas to try them on market. I prepared architectural solutions, created software using multiple technologies - frontend and backend and mobile sides, to finally launch it inside cloud infrastructure that I also prepared

I was working in a software house, which delivers many international projects. Some of technologies I worked with: Python 3, AngularJS, React, React Native, GraphQL, relational databases like MySQL and PostgreSQL and AWS platform. I also ran a couple of workshops, both internal and external

I was responsible for developing and maintaining e-learning application LearnWay, on backend side using PHP and PostgreSQL, and on the frontend side using AngularJS and jQuery. Moreover, I was building solutions to contenerize applications using Docker
